channel.title: Thoughts on Kenny Workman
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on Kenny Workman

item.title: On Writing
item.description: No one wants to write. Usually in college you’re writing about something boring, and you’d rather do anything else. There’s a certain permanence to the written word that can be scary. Thoughts are fleeting and lossy, but there’s comfort in this lack of state. Its easy to confide in your strokes of genius or dismiss stupidity when such musings pass as quickly as they come. Distilling a set of complex thoughts into a sentence or paragraph forever exposes the captured idea to the lens of public scrutiny.
